name: Image Latest Tag Check
description: Raises errors on container images that have **latest** tag.

name: No Resource Limits Pods
description: Identifies pods that do not have resource limits set

name: Persistent Volume Claims Outside of StatefulSets
description: Checks for PersistentVolumeClaims to configured for Pods managed by StatefulSets.

name: Large Namespace
description: Identifies namespaces that are using large chunk of total cluster CPU and Memory resources.

name: Public Application
description: Identifies applications that are exposed using Ingress.

name: Stateful Application
description: Identifies stateful applications that have persistent volumes attached.

name: Stateful Public Application
description: Identifies applications that are exposed using Ingress and also have Persistent Volume Claims attached.

name: Container Memory Usage
description: Checks for container memory request to be set and marks containers as high and medium memory users.

name: Secret Accessors
description: Identifies applications (outside of kube-system) that access Kubernets secrets.
